TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NameReferenceConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供型別轉換，以將字串名稱轉換為具有該名稱之物件的物件參考，或是從物件圖形傳回物件的名稱。

span.span: Provides type conversion to convert a string name into an object reference to the object with that name, or to return the name of an object from the object graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會提供類型轉換器包裝函式約兩個服務。This class provides a type converter wrapper around two services. 實作會使用服務內容，以在 XAML 中依名稱執行物件的解析度。The implementation uses service from context to perform the resolution of an object by name in XAML. 這是相關的 XAML 讀取器和.NET Framework XAML 服務中的 XAML 寫入器實作的一部分。This is part of the relevant XAML reader and XAML writer implementations in .NET Framework XAML Services. 這個轉換子的適當函式需要服務是可從服務內容。Proper function of this converter requires that the service is available from service context. 實作會使用內容，以儲存/序列化期間執行的物件的參考名稱解析服務。The implementation uses service from context to perform the resolution of a reference name for an object during save/serialization. 這是相關的讀取器和寫入器實作，而其內容的一部分。This is part of the relevant reader and writer implementations and their context. 這個轉換子的適當函式需要有基礎可用的服務。Proper function of this converter requires that there be an underlying service available. 此型別轉換子實作並為慣用基底型別，因為未設定範圍為離散的轉換型別。This type converter implementation is atypical for the base type because it is not scoped to a discrete conversion type. 它可以有可能的任何物件之間來回轉換的參考名稱，只要該物件可能會有在 XAML 中，指派給它的名稱，且支援的內容具有必要的服務，以傳回結果。It can potentially convert any object to and from a referencing name so long as that object could have a name assigned to it in XAML, and the supporting context has the necessary services to return results. 一般服務支援的一部分，System.Xaml 基底實作並提供並服務以供。As part of general services support, the System.Xaml base implementation of and provide and services for use by . 名稱為基礎，這些服務會使用其中一個`x:Name`或使用屬性別名屬性。The name basis for these services uses either `x:Name` or a attributed alias property.

related.span: XAML 類型轉換器或標記延伸

span.span: Type Converters or Markup Extensions for XAML
System.Xaml Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`destinationType`參考傳回型別`true`; 所有其他`destinationType`值傳回`false`。A `destinationType` that references the type returns `true`; all other `destinationType` values return `false`. 這個方法會傳回 false，如果`context`已`null`，或如果無法為從服務取得`context`。This method returns false if `context` is `null`, or if cannot be obtained as a service from `context`.

span.span: Converts the provided object to another object, using the specified context and culture information.

returns.span: 傳回的物件，可能是已在相關支援組件中完成型別對應且能夠在 XAML 中以 XAML 名稱參考宣告的任何物件。

span.span: The returned object, which is potentially any object that is type-mapped in the relevant backing assemblies and capable of being declared in XAML with a XAML name reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有輸入提供的轉換結果。Only a input provides a conversion result.
